verses.text: Blessed isevery one that feareth the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; that walketh in his ways.
For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shaltthou be, and it shall bewell with thee.
Thy wife shall beas a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
Yea, thou shalt see thy childrenâ€™s children, andpeace upon Israel.
